unittitle.altrender: Alice Isabel Hazeltine - Notes on Children's Periodicals

did.unittitle: Alice Isabel Hazeltine - Notes on Children's Periodicals

repository.corpname: Columbia University.Rare Book and Manuscript Library,

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Assistant professor of library work for children, Columbia University School of Library Service, 1927-1943.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A collection of research material, including notes, bibliographical lists, and descriptions concerning children's magazines as well as letters to Hazeltine. The letters are from librarians answering her inquiries about children's periodical holdings. In addition to the lists of magazine titles, there are handwritten sheets with descriptive information relating to individual magazines. It appears that most of the material is related to a proposed book project on the history of children's magazines that would have also included information regarding the holdings of individual libraries.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is located off-site. You will need to request this material at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. The RBML maintains ownership of the physical material only. Copyright remains with the creator and his/her heirs. The responsibility to secure copyright permission rests with the patron.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition
acqinfo.p: 1959 M-59 Hazeltine, Alice I., Estate Gift

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Alice Isabel Hazeltine papers; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.
